    module:Engine

    Class representing a Game Engine.

    Constructor

    new module:Engine(mapPath, entityFactory)

    Create a Game Engine.
    Source:
    • gameEngine.mjs, line 14
    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    mapPath string URL to the map JSON data.
    entityFactory EntityFactory Instance of an EntityFactory. Used when calling addEntity() method.

    subsetName string Name of component used to get subset.
